trans-unit.source: Allows the transformation of a set of .NET Framework types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).
trans-unit.target: 允許將資料合約中使用的 .NET Framework 類型集合轉換成 XML 結構描述檔案 (.xsd)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by common language runtime (CLR) types and when you need to export XML schemas for each type to be consumed by other Web services.
trans-unit.target: 當您已建立合併 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別表示之資料的 Web 服務，以及當您需要匯出其他 Web 服務要取用之每個型別的 XML 結構描述時，即可使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 類別。

trans-unit.source: That is, <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> transforms a set of CLR types into XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: 也就是 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 會將 CLR 型別集合轉換成 XML 結構描述

trans-unit.source: (For more information about the types that can be used, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).) The schemas can then be exposed through a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document for use by others who need to interoperate with your service.
trans-unit.target: (如需可以使用的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約序列化程式所支援的型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。)這樣一來，這些結構描述就可以透過 Web 服務描述語言 (Web Services Description Language，WSDL) 文件公開，提供需要與您的服務相互操作之其他使用者加以使用。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to transform XML schemas and create the CLR types that represent the data in a selected programming language.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果您要建立必須與現有 Web 服務相互操作的 Web 服務，則可使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> 來轉換 XML 結構描述，並且建立可表示選定程式設計語言內資料的 CLR 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> generates an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object that contains the collection of schemas.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 會產生其中包含結構描述集合的 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Access the set of schemas through the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 透過 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> 屬性，存取結構描述的集合。

trans-unit.source: To quickly generate XML schema definition (XSD) files that other Web services can consume, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>.
trans-unit.target: 為了快速產生其他 Web 服務可以取用的 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 檔案，此時要使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>。

trans-unit.source: Exporting Schemas Into an XmlSchemaSet
trans-unit.target: 將結構描述匯出至 XmlSchemaSet

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class that contains XML schema files, you should be aware of the following.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立其中包含 XML 結構描述檔案之 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 類別的執行個體，您應該留意下列事項。

trans-unit.source: The set of types you are exporting are recorded as an internal set of data contracts.
trans-unit.target: 匯出的型別集合會記錄成為內部的資料合約集合。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> method multiple times to add new types to the schema set without degrading performance because only the new types will be added to the set.
trans-unit.target: 因此您可以多次呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 方法，在不會降低效能的情況下將新型別加入結構描述集合中，因為只有新型別會新增至該集合。

trans-unit.source: During the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> operation, the existing schemas are compared to the new schemas being added.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 作業期間，現有的結構描述會跟新加入的結構描述進行比較。

trans-unit.source: If there are conflicts, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這時發生衝突，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A conflict is usually detected if two types with the same data contract name but different contracts (different members) are exported by the same <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 通常在兩種型別使用相同的資料合約名稱，但是同一個 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 執行個體卻匯出不同的合約 (即不同的成員) 時，就會偵測到衝突。

trans-unit.source: Using the Exporter
trans-unit.target: 使用匯出工具

trans-unit.source: A recommended way of using this class is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的建議使用方式如下：

trans-unit.source: Use one of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一種 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 多載，即可判定是否可以匯出指定的型別或型別集合。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the overloads that is appropriate to your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 使用符合您個人需求的一種多載。

trans-unit.source: Call the corresponding <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫對應的 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the schemas from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 從 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 屬性擷取結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> and calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 的執行個體，然後呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that contains the schemas to be exported.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />，其中包含要匯出的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> class with the specified set of schemas.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的結構描述集合，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you have an existing <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to which you want to add new schemas.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要將新結構描述新增至現有的 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 時，即可使用這個多載。

trans-unit.source: After you construct a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> with this overload, call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method to add new types to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: 在使用這個多載建構 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> 之後，請呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 方法，將新型別新增至現有的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a common language runtime (CLR) type (or set of types) can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否能夠匯出 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型 (或類型集合)。

trans-unit.source: Not all CLR types can be used in data contracts.
trans-unit.target: 並不是所有的 CLR 型別都能夠用在資料合約中。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can be serialized, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需序列化項目的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約序列化程式所支援的型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that contains the assemblies with the types to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" />，其中包含具有要匯出之類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a set of assemblies can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否能夠匯出包含在組件集合中的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果能夠匯出類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> that contains the specified types to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" />，其中包含要匯出的指定類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the set of .common language runtime (CLR) types contained in a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否能夠匯出包含在 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> 中的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the types can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果能夠匯出類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to export.
trans-unit.target: 要匯出的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified common language runtime (CLR) type can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否能夠匯出指定的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type can be exported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果能夠匯出類型，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%28System.Type%29> method before calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會在呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%28System.Type%29> 方法之前先呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%28System.Type%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the common language runtime (CLR) type, or set of types, into a set of XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: 將 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型或類型集合轉換成 XML 結構描述集合。

trans-unit.source: As a recommended practice, use one of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 建議做法是使用其中一個 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> 多載來判定是否能夠匯出指定的型別或型別集合。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method, retrieve the schemas from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 方法後，從 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 屬性擷取結構描述。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />) that contains the types to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (屬於 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />)，其中包含要匯出的類型。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the types contained in the specified collection of assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 轉換包含在指定組件集合中的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="assemblies" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblies" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> in the collection is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (of <see cref="T:System.Type" />) that contains the types to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> (屬於 <see cref="T:System.Type" />)，其中包含要匯出的類型。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the types contained in the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: 轉換已傳遞到這個方法之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> 中所包含的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="types" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A type in the collection is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的類型為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to transform into an XML schema.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成 XML 結構描述的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type into an XML schema definition language (XSD) schema.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 類型轉換成 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A> to determine whether the type can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.CanExport%2A>，即可判定是否能夠匯出型別。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> method, the schema can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export%2A> 方法後，即可透過 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Schemas%2A> 屬性擷取結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to query.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the top-level name and namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的最上層名稱和命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that represents the top-level name and namespace for this <see cref="T:System.Type" />, which is written to the stream when writing this object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的最上層名稱和命名空間，而這個類型會在進行寫入這個物件時被寫入至資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to return a schema for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回結構描述的類型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML schema type for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定類型的 XML 結構描述類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" /> that contains the XML schema.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType" />，其中包含 XML 結構描述。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of this method is to allow anonymous types in XML schema to be represented.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的主要用途是允許在 XML 結構描述中提供匿名類型。

trans-unit.source: Because anonymous types do not have a contract name and namespace, they cannot be looked up using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為匿名型別沒有合約名稱和命名空間，所以不能使用 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> 進行查閱。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> definition for such types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回這種型別的 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> 定義。

trans-unit.source: The types for which the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> method returns a valid name, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.GetSchemaTypeName%2A> 方法傳回有效名稱的類型，這個方法會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that was exported.
trans-unit.target: 已匯出的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the contract name and contract namespace for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的合約名稱以及合約命名空間 (Namespace)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> that represents the contract name of the type and its namespace.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />，表示類型的合約名稱及其命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> argument is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 引數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> that contains options that can be set for the export operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" />，其中包含能夠針對匯出作業進行設定的選項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" /> that contains options used to customize how types are exported to schemas.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions" />，其中包含用來自訂如何將型別匯出至結構描述的選項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of exported XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: 取得已匯出之 XML 結構描述的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that contains the schemas transformed from the set of common language runtime (CLR) types after calling the <see cref="Overload:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />，其中包含在呼叫 <see cref="Overload:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter.Export" /> 方法後，從 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 型別集合轉換來的結構描述。
